species.name: bibarel
descriptions: A river dammed by Bibarel will never overflow its banks, which is appreciated by people nearby.
Bibarel fur repels water and is also a fantastic material for heat retention. These Pokémon create dams on rivers to live in.
It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
While its movements out of water are sluggish, it can swim as fast as any FEEBAS.

abilities.name: simple
abilities.effect: Doubles the Pokémon's stat modifiers.  These doubled modifiers are still capped at -6 or 6 stages.

abilities.name: unaware
abilities.effect: Ignores other Pokémon's stat modifiers for damage and accuracy calculation.

abilities.name: moody
abilities.effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.
